page.title: 09STRATFORD FIRE STATION
page.content: At the fire station they have 2 normal engines and an {emergency}tender engine that goes out to road crashes.The engines weigh 10 tons without{equipment}and they cost around Â£65000. They carry 1800 litres of { {water.}There are ladders on top of the engines.The longest ladder is 15m and there are also roof ladders which have wheels on so they slide easily on house roofs. The engines are designed to carry{six} {people,}the driver,the officer in charge and 4 riders in the back.To get to the{fire}takes about 8 minutes and only 5% of their calls are false alarms which is quite good.Some stations have junior firemen and you have to be 16years, but to be a proper {fireman}you must be 18.They practise every day on a tall practice building which has 4 floors.
